name: Space Dash (Atronocero)
description:
Welcome to Space Dash! You are a spaceship and on your way back to the planet Earth, but there are some dangerous meteors trying to stop you.

Fortunately, NASA has provided you powerups which are scattered about the space, collect them for a temporary boost.

Default Controls
  • Left/Right: Move
  • Spacebar / B: Shoot
  • P: Pause

Tip: Controls can be changed anytime under "Options".

Powerups
  • Speed: Thrust faster without getting hit, at the cost of more fuel depleted and hard to control
  • ScoreBooster: Increase your score gain to increase your lead
  • Weapon: Blast the meteors. Start with 3 ammo, get more upgrading at the marketplace.
  • Shield: Protects your ship from most hazards;keeps fuel from depleting.
  • Fuel: Keeps your ship alive in fuel game type.Don't miss them

Tip: Lengthen your powerups with cash at the marketplace.

Features
  • Upgrade your powerups at the Marketplace
  • Earn cash by thrusting further, destroying meteors, etc
  • Complete quests, earn XP, level up and unlock amazing features
  • 6 different game modes
  • Edit your controls
  • Sign-in to compete with friends and save your progress
  • 4 different ships
  • Face against powerful bosses in the new Raid Mode!
